item.title: Deadpool & Wolverine’s Disney+ Release Date Revealed After $1.3 Billion Theatrical Run
item.description: After a massive success for its theatrical run, Deadpool & Wolverine has finally landed its release date on Disney+ for the major Phase 5 movie.

item.title: Director Joshua Morgan & Producer Lucas A. Ferrara Explain What Makes Children Of The Pines A Different Type Of Horror Film
item.description: Screen Rant interviews Joshua Morgan and Lucas A. Ferrara about Children of the Pine's major influences and filming near the real Timberline Lodge.

item.title: Gladiator's 10 Most Rewatchable Scenes
item.description: Gladiator is one of the most iconic films of all time, partly due to the sheer amount of rewatchable scenes that Ridley Scott’s epic includes.
